medical_history.chief_complaint: Generalized fatigue, pain and stiffness around both hips and shoulders.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began with generalized fatigue, pain and stiffness around the hips and shoulders, leading to difficulty standing from a seated position and raising arms above shoulders. Symptoms significantly improved with a 7-day course of prednisone but deteriorated after stopping the medication. Prednisone was restarted due to clinical suspicion, and a temporal artery biopsy confirmed the diagnosis.
medical_history.social_history: The patient has never smoked cigarettes, drinks alcohol occasionally, and has no history of illicit drug use.
